mapper.select: select id, pro_no as proNo, name as name, color as color, image_url as imageUrl, buy_prize as buyPrize, sale_prize as salePrize from tb_product order by id desc

select tp.id, tp.pro_no as proNo, tp.name as name, tp.color as color, tp.image_url as imageUrl, tp.buy_prize as buyPrize, tp.sale_prize as salePrize, ts.stock from tb_product tp LEFT join tb_stock ts on tp.id=ts.pro_id where 1=1
and tp.name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
order by tp.id desc

select count(1) from tb_product where 1=1
and name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product ( name, pro_no, color, buy_prize, sale_prize, create_time, update_time) values ( #{name}, #{proNo}, #{color}, #{buyPrize}, #{salePrize}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select tp.id, tp.pro_no as proNo, tp.name as name, tp.color as color, tp.image_url as imageUrl, tp.buy_prize as buyPrize, tp.sale_prize as salePrize, ts.stock from tb_product tp LEFT join tb_stock ts on tp.id=ts.pro_id where tp.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update tb_product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_no = #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buy_prize = #{buyPrize}, sale_prize = #{salePrize}, update_time=now() where id = #{id}
